Voice Controlled Wheelchair.title: Voice Controlled Wheelchair
Voice Controlled Wheelchair.description: Prototyped a semi autonomous wheelchair that included obstacle detection, LiDAR, and speech commands

Voice Controlled Browser Agent.title: Voice Controlled Browser Agent
Voice Controlled Browser Agent.description: Developed a voice controlled browser agent for the blind that included a websocket for concurrent communication of commands between front and back end, Google Gemini API integration, and touchless page navigation
